trans-unit.source: Provides a way to request processing beyond record retrieval for a data retrieval operation of a data source control.
trans-unit.target: 為資料來源控制項的資料擷取作業供一種方法，以便要求記錄擷取以外的處理方式。

trans-unit.source: Data source controls use the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceCapabilities> enumeration in conjunction with the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments> class to request paging, sorting, or other select-specific capabilities when performing a data retrieval operation.
trans-unit.target: 資料來源會控制使用<xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceCapabilities>列舉型別搭配<xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments>類別來執行資料擷取作業時，要求分頁、 排序，或其他選取特定的功能。

trans-unit.source: The requested capabilities are checked against the actual capabilities of the data source control during the data retrieval operation, and if they do not match an exception is raised.
trans-unit.target: 要求的功能資料擷取作業期間，系統會檢查針對實際資料來源控制項的功能，並不相符，如果引發例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: This enumeration supports the <xref:System.FlagsAttribute> attribute, which enables you to use more than one member at a time.
trans-unit.target: 這個列舉支援<xref:System.FlagsAttribute>屬性，可讓您一次使用一個以上的成員。

trans-unit.source: Represents no paging, sorting, or total row count retrieval capabilities.
trans-unit.target: 表示沒有分頁、排序或總資料列數的擷取能力。

trans-unit.source: Represents the capability to page through the rows returned by an <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.ExecuteSelect(System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments)" /> operation.
trans-unit.target: 表示有對 <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.ExecuteSelect(System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments)" /> 作業傳回的資料列進行分頁的能力。

trans-unit.source: Represents the capability to retrieve a total row count of data, which corresponds to using the <see cref="F:System.Web.UI.DataSourceOperation.SelectCount" /> value.
trans-unit.target: 表示取出資料總列數的能力，等同使用 <see cref="F:System.Web.UI.DataSourceOperation.SelectCount" /> 這個值。

trans-unit.source: Represents the capability to sort through the rows returned by an <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.ExecuteSelect(System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments)" /> operation.
trans-unit.target: 表示有對 <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.ExecuteSelect(System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments)" /> 作業傳回的資料列進行排序的能力。
